actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States which provide aid to dependent children of unemployed parents must require the unemployed parent to participate in a community work experience program.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require a State which provides aid to dependent children of unemployed parents to require such parents to participate in community work experience programs. Requires States providing aid to such parents to establish community work experience programs for, at a minimum, parents who are principal earners who have been unemployed for at least 30 days prior to receiving aid.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Social Security Act to provide that States which provide aid to dependent children of unemployed parents must require the unemployed parent to participate in a community work experience program.
